class.name: rviz_map_editor/Teleop
class.description: A panel widget allowing simple diff-drive style robot base control.

class.description: Displays direction and scale of accelerations from sensor_msgs/Imu messages.

class.description: Tool for planting flags on the ground plane in rviz.

class.description: Tool for planting flags on the ground plane in rviz.
